price: Ni We Ntangiriro akaba n’Iherezo, Ugaragara (Uri hejuru ya buri kintu) akaba n’Utagaragara (uri bugufi ya buri kintu). Kandi ni We Mumenyi uhebuje wa buri kintu.
arabic: هُوَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُ وَٱلۡأٓخِرُ وَٱلظَّٰهِرُ وَٱلۡبَاطِنُۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-awalu wal-ākhiru wal-ẓāhiru wal-bāṭinu wahuwa bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
